summary: Recolors the brown hood while wearing a mask to make it darker, goes good with nightingale armor.
descriptionHtml:
This simple re-texture recolors the brown hood while wearing a mask and makes it a bit darker. Not all masks use the brown texture so it will only change some of them. I made it to go with nightingale armor but it may look good on some other things too.

If you don\'t use the download manager to install just extract it to your data folder
author: boomer678
